document_data.name: Mirksha, Mirksha, and Mirksha
document_data.mainbody: '''Mirksha, Mirksha, and Mirksha''' was an imports shop in the city of [[Archenbridge]].
document_data.Services: This business sold metalwork, [[spice]]s, and [[silk]] imported from the nations of [[Cormyr]] and [[Sembia]].
document_data.Inhabitants: This shop was operated by three brothers, with the oldest, [[Weygart Mirksha]], being the primary owner. The shop also owned a warehouse and trading post in [[White Ford]].
